page.title: 10DEVENISH ISLAND (CONT'''')
page.content: in the nearby museum. {Upper Graveyard: It has many old grave stones but it also has a unique two armed cross from the 15th century. {TOURISM: There is a small ferry service from Trory which is opposite Devenish.The ferry is called the St.Molaise and it travels to the island every fifteen minutes.Most of the visitors are foreigners and they either come by ferry, the tour boat the Kestrel or one of the great amounts of cruisers whish travel the lake.There are well over three thousand tourists in six months.
